Career Mistakes - 1: Never accept Counter Offers after you resign

TEEMA Solutions Group Inc (TEEMA) has become one of the fastest growing Staffing Solutions companies in North America. Our focus is delivering full-cycle staffing solutions, whether that is short term, contract or long term, permanent. We love our clients and we support them by placing quality people in the right position at the right time. TEEMA is governed by rock solid values, a mandate to empower our members and a commitment to excellence. Our Members are the most tenured in the staffing industry, with deep and wide networks of talented resources. We are passionate about what we do. Our clients have access to a wealth of experience unsurpassed in staffing. We believe the future is about ‘disrupting our industry‘ and our rapid growth is evident of that (cited by Profit 50, Red Herring, INC 5000 and Branham 300). Visit our company page: TEEMA on LinkedIn

-Generated $250k+ in revenue in first year as a Full Desk Recruiter-CyberCoders recruits professionals for all types of jobs including engineering, technology, sales, executive, financial, accounting, scientific, legal and operational positions across all industries. With a team of more than 330 recruiters and thousands of job openings, CyberCoders is a worldwide leader in recruiting and staffing.

Managed full hiring life-cycle including: -Establishing trusting relationships with clients -Pre-screening and coordinating interviews with candidates and hiring managers -Interview preparation and negotiating salary -Offer deliverance/closing and post-placement follow-up

-Reached 200% of Admissions goals in 2011 and 2012 school years -My mission as an Admission Recruiter was to "change the world, one life at a time, by helping students achieve their dreams through education." -We make connections with others while utilizing UTI’s Service Excellence approach and thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative, team environment. Proactively establishing relationships with other departments on campus is vital within this role, as well as following established guidelines and procedures. -Effective listening and an engaging communication style are both essential in my success in this position. -Maintained a strong customer-focus, extroverted style that can enliven, engage and positively impact individuals and candidates.

-Managed and facilitated daily high school/adult presentations and social programs for marketing campaigns, identifying and diversifying student development, and help potential students reach their educational goals-Interviewed and screened prospective students to understand their motivations and provide professional recommendations and programs-Analyzed marketing trends in technology to coincide with students’ interests and career goals

summary: Assertive staffing professional with cross-functional experience in Full-desk Recruiting, Business Development, B2B Sales, Career Advancement, and Best Hiring Practices. My clients best know me for my ability to find strong local candidates within 48 hours, no matter what type of position a client is hiring for.  My focus as a Tech Recruiter, Staffing Specialist, and Talent Acquisition Consultant is to make sure I match the best possible candidates with my clients' most difficult positions. For companies that are growing fast you will not find a more valuable resource than myself when trying to find strong, local and qualified candidates asap!  Call or email me for details: 951.743.8962 or csullano@teemagroup.com.  See more at www.teemagroup.comSpecialties & Technologies: VP & CTO Placements, Sales/Advertising/Marketing, Supply Chain & Logistics, Accounting & Finance, Healthcare IT, and Software/Hardware including: .NET, PHP, Ruby on Rails, Python, Mobile (iOS and Android), JavaScript, Automation, Java, Sinatra, Padrino, Perl, Python, Django, Flask, Pyramid, Java, J2EE, Spring, Struts, Hibernate, Scala, REST, SOAP, Groovy, Grails, LAMP, Zend, Symfony, Laravel, CakePHP, Codeigniter, Drupal, Magento, Joomla, Wordpress, AWS, Puppet, Chef, Jenkins, Capistrano, Nagios, Redis, Hive, MongoDB, CouchDB, Nosql, Mysql, Neo4J, Solr, Hadoop, HTML5, CSS, Javascript, Jquery, Node.js, Ember,js, Express, Require, Backbone, Raphael.js, Knockout, Bootstrap, LESS, SASS, Coffeescript, Angular, Objective C, Android, C#, ASP.NET, ADO.NET, SQL Server, SSIS, SSRS, SaaS, T-SQL, MySQL, MSSQL, NoSQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Cucumber, Selenium, Automation, Rspec, Windows Administration, Linux Administration, Cloud, and Virtualization.A little bit about me:- Loving Husband & Father of 2 baby boys  =)- California Raised- Gym Rat wannabe- Student of Life- Steak...it's what's for dinnerFeel free to add me!  =)
